title: 时装工坊玩家与模特互动问题
author: 931052301@qq.co
txt_content: ess里面也试过了，ban也ban了，玩家还是可以和模特互动

replies.author: Goblins
replies.txt_content:
试试banitem with NBT
禁用掉玩家与模特的交互和使用权限
安装banitem with NBT 
指令/banitem add f:use,Interact c:f

replies.author: Namefind
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=461468
worldGround里面的箱子交互权限禁掉，亲测有效。指令你自己摸索吧OWO
